nodes.text: A wrist laser was a type of compact laser weapon capable of inflicting serious damage at extremely close range. Wrist lasers consisted of rechargeable solar-powered gauntlets. A user had the option of causing the chamber of the gauntlet to be overloaded, which would result in a small explosion.
Wrist lasers typically cost 2,000 credits and 100 credits for a power pack.
Variants of this weapon included the LG-5 laser gauntlet manufactured by Prax Arms, and similarly wrist-mounted wrist blaster.
